Please note this mailbox is exclusively for queries. If you sent financial instructions to it, we will not be held liable for any delays in processing them. To ensure quick turnaround times, please ensure you upload instructions on our online portal, or email instructions@stanlib.com.
Online self-service:
Our secure paperless digital transacting allows you to load all instructions on our online portal. This will ensure your instructions are processed in real time, and you will be able to track their progress.
Kind Regards, STANLIB UT Broker Support
